title: HOUR 2 - Right & wrong, LeBron, Westbrook
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Right & wrong, LeBron, Westbrook
description:
Where Colin was right and wrong

Why LeBron James isn't talked about as being one of the best scorers

Russell Westbrook has always been limited


Guest: Mark Schlereth
